    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int mapSize)
      Initialises the player and assigns a random position This constructor is to be used for solo games
      Player(int mapSize, Team team)
      Initialises the player and assigns a random position This constructor is to be used for collaborative games

      • move

        public boolean move(char direction)
        Moves the player according to his command 'u': Go Up 'd': Go Down 'l' Go Left 'r': Go Right Inputs are accepted in lower or upper case
        Parameters:
        direction - the direction the user wants to move
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid, false otherwise

      • setPosition

        public boolean setPosition(Position p,
                           Map map)
        Checks the position of the player
        Parameters:
        p - the position of the player
        map - the map
        Returns:
        true if the tile is OK to land on, false otherwise
